response.overview: Monique is Parisian, she is 35 and a Cuban father she does not know. The morning when he is about to travel to Havana, at a Paris Airport he meets a Cuban in his 50 who waits for the same flight in transit connection to Cuba. Flights are canceled due to an unexpected storm. That night, in the room of a Hotel next to the Airport; lovers, between confessions and feelings will try to share their visions of Cuba, traveling between storms of truths, frustrations, doubts and hopes.
response.title: Vuelos Prohibidos
